channel.title: Posts on Simon Georges-Kot
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Simon Georges-Kot

item.title: Meaningful chloropleth maps
item.description: I look at different ways to group geographical units in order to build chloropleth maps, and at different methods to choose the number of classes in the most meaningful way.

item.title: Geomarketing
item.description: In this post, I explore some methods to compute information on the market of businesses from open-access datasets.
